snippet: Slim Shadey won the San Marcos Stakes at Santa Anita in Arcadia, Calif., giving the Hall of Fame jockey Gary Stevens, 49, his first stakes win since his comeback began Jan. 6.
abstract: Slim Shadey wins San Marcos Stakes at Santa Anita in Arcadia, Calif, giving Hall of Fame jockey Gary Stevens his first stakes win since his comeback began Jan 6.
lead_paragraph: Slim Shadey won the San Marcos Stakes at Santa Anita in Arcadia, Calif., giving the Hall of Fame jockey Gary Stevens, 49, his first stakes win since his comeback began Jan. 6.

headline.seo: Jockey Gary Stevens Wins San Marcos Stakes
